about_the_game:
Return to the world of the award-winning therapize-'em-up with Vampire Therapist: Couples Therapy! 

What happens when "till death do us part" means forever? And how annoying is it when your partner leaves their bloodstained clothes on the floor instead of putting it in the hamper where it belongs? 

Experience a story of revolutions, relationships, and everyday domestic annoyances as you saddle up once more as Sam Walls, amateur therapist and cowboy vampire.

And when you're not in a client session, uncover a mystery involving a legendary composer. 

With brand-new characters, voiceover, and backgrounds, you'll get to explore the world of Vampire Therapist even more deeply, and learn a little something about yourself along the way.

It's time to get Bach to therapy.

content_descriptors.notes:
Vampire Therapist is a game about therapy. It deals with real, human, personal issues with humor and sensitivity. It is intended as a mature game.

Couples Therapy deals with interpersonal issues, state violence, religion, and abusive relationships. Do not purchase the game if you have significant difficulty with these topics.

short_description: You've helped the immortal undead live with themselves, but can you help them live with one another? Can vampires find domestic bliss? You'll need all your therapy skills to handle this couple in this expansion to the award-winning Vampire Therapist!
